text: Ezekiel is the graecised version of the Hebrew name Yehezkel, denoting a prophet of the Hebrew Bible. The form Ezekiel is used in the Christian Old Testament. Ezekiel may also refer to: ==People== * Ezekiel (name), a variant of the Hebrew name Yehezkel, used as both a given name and surname (including a list of people and fictional characters with the name) *Yehezkel, disambiguation page ==Arts, entertainment, and media== ===Fictional characters=== * King Ezekiel, a character appearing in The Walking Dead The Walking Dead franchise * Ezekiel, a character from the Total Drama animated series ===Literature=== * Book of Ezekiel, a book of the Hebrew and Christian Bibles ===Music=== * Book of Ezekiel (album), 2007 album of rapper Freekey Zekey * EZ3kiel, French alternative music band ==See also== *
title: Ezekiel (disambiguation)
